name: Bird and Flower Felt Pin
description:
Tweet Tweet! This sweet little felt bird is taking time to smell the little sequin flowers. A perfect small reminder of spring that'll be great on your lapel or bag. Made of 2 pieces of a wool blended felt sandwiched together that have been hand embroidered and and carefully joined with a tiny seed bead per stitch. A tiny bit of cotton batting adds a bit of body to the center. So cute!
Approx 1 5/8" x 1"

Comes wrapped up in a pretty little box so it's ready to give or to keep!

name: Little Rabbit Felt Pin
description:
A lovely rabbit silhouette sits in a grassy flowery meadow. Made from two layers of a wool blend felt with tiny seed beads lovingly stitched around the edges (and a bit of cotton batting stuffed in between to add body). This little brooch is the perfect way to say hello to spring.

Measures 2 1/8 x 1 1/8" 

Comes wrapped in a little box so it's ready to give or to keep.

name: Scarlet Sunburst Brooch
description:
An adorable flower in shades of scarlet, salmon and orange blooms on this lovely wool felt brooch. It's crowned with small vintage plastic flowers in scarlet and orange with a tiny faceted salmon bead in the center. Made from many layers of felt that are sandwiched together with a tiny bit of batting in the middle. The edges are lovingly stitched with a tiny seed bead in each stitch. Measures approx 1 3/4".

Comes wrapped in a little gift box so it's ready to give or to keep.

name: Bohemian Honey Clusters
description:
Lucious orbs of golden honey are crowned with a halo faceted beads in pretty shades of blue and green. Accented with an antique gold bead cap and leverbacks.

These measure about 1 1/4" from the bottom of the leverback.
